column3: and food presentation were worth the price. Im not a fan of rolls with mayo or cream cheese and they had a great selection of those. If for some reason you're not going for sushi
column4: they had a pretty extensive menu for other food options (ramen
column7: there's no way to walk in Fri - Sun night w/o reservations. There were people still waiting when we walked out that had been there when we got seated.
